title: Massive fps drop
body: Started a ranked game fine as VI with an fps around 80-90. Then mid way through the game I start getting massive drops to 14 fps.  Second dragon fight I'm at 1-4 fps and then stuck that way for the rest of the game. I tried lowering my graphics to the lowest setting but it didn't help at all.

replies.body: There might be some bad game assets failing to load up properly in-game and causing frame drops (maybe baron or dragon).  Could just be bad drivers too!  My recommendation here would be to instead go through each step of the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to help troubleshoot this and rule out possibilities!  Let me know if you have any questions!
